I completely agree. With the development of any emerging technology, it is crucial to consider all the potential risks and benefits and create regulations and guidelines to ensure its responsible and ethical use.

The development and deployment of autonomous drones should be subjected to rigorous testing and review to identify their potential risks and ensure that they operate within ethical and legal boundaries. Governments and militarizes should also establish clear guidelines and regulations to govern the deployment and use of autonomous drones in warfare.

It's also essential to consider the opinions of different stakeholders, including human rights organizations, international law experts, and the general public to ensure that the development of autonomous drone technology aligns with global ethical and legal standards.

In summary, responsible development and deployment of autonomous drones require continuous oversight, and ethical considerations must be at the forefront of any deployment decision.
